name: Absorba Shield
effect:
As an additional cost to play Absorba Shield, discard a card.

Target Heralds of Galactus attacker or defender you control gets +2 DEF this attack and an additional +2 DEF this attack unless an opponent reveals a card from his hand with cost greater than the cost of the card you discarded.

name: Act of Defiance, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Act of Defiance, choose two different team affiliations among characters in play.

Ongoing: Crossover the chosen affiliations.

Skrull attackers you control with cost 3 or less get +1 ATK while attacking a character with greater cost.

name: Adam Warlock, Protector of the Soul Gem
effect:
Recruit Adam Warlock only if you control a cosmic character.

Characters with cost 4 or less have invulnerability.

Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, stun all characters with cost 3 or less.

name: Admiral Galen Kor, Lunatic Legion
effect:
Reservist, Press (When you recruit this card, your next character costs 1 less to recruit this turn for each press card you recruited this turn, but no less than 1.)

At the start of the combat phase, Admiral Galen Kor gets +1 ATK for each other character you recruited this turn.

name: Ahura, Heir to Attilan
effect:
Concealed

Whenever a character you control with a cosmic counter becomes stunned, you may put a cosmic counter on another cosmic character you control.
What child hasn’t dreamed of being a prince? This one, perhaps.

name: Air-Walker, Gabriel Lan
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal

Cosmic: Activate >>> Target opponent exhausts a ready character he controls. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"Even the Android betrayed me."

name: Air-Walker, Harbinger of Despair
effect: Cosmic: At the start of your attack step, target opponent exhausts a ready character he controls.
"This world is most unsettling."

name: Alaris, The Outgoing One
effect:
A character protected by Alaris cannot be attacked.

Pay 2 endurance >>> Exchange the positions of Alaris and an Inhumans character you control.
As long as Alaris is buying, everyone's his friend!

name: Alien Insurrection
effect: Target defender gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +4 ATK this attack if it has the Skrull affiliation and two or more other affiliations.
"These fools thought they could crush our spirits with propaganda and brutality?"

name: Alpha Primitives, Army
effect:
Concealed

Discard Alpha Primitives >>> Return a face-down resource you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row. Use this power only if Alpha Primitives is in your hand.

name: Armageddon
effect: Target attacker you control gets +6 ATK this attack.
"The heavens will run red with blood."

name: Armies of Doom
effect:
Play Armies of Doom only during the build phase.

If you have played no other plot twists this turn, you may put an Army Doom character card with cost 3 or less from your KO'd pile into your front row. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, KO that character.

name: Arsenal of Doom
effect:
Activate >>> Look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card into your KO'd pile.

Activate >>> Remove target Army Doom character card in your KO'd pile from the game. You may recruit that card this turn.

name: Assault and Battery
effect: Ongoing: Characters get -2 DEF while in combat with a character with the same cost.
"Fodder to muck up the works."

name: Astral Suppression
effect:
As an additional cost to play Astral Suppression, exhaust a character you control named Dr. Doom.

Choose one: KO target stunned character; or target player reveals his hand and then discards a non-character card of your choice.

name: Attilan
effect:
Terraform

Activate >>> Search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, and put that card on top of your deck. Use this power only if you control an Inhumans character and no face-down resources.
"In such place as Attilan, abnormality means power."

name: Barbaric Brawl
effect: Target attacker gets +3 ATK this attack. If that character has a cosmic counter, remove that counter.
"When Titans clash, no one wins."

name: Barnacle, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical

Reservist

Barnacle gets +1 ATK for each character adjacent to him.

Characters adjacent to Barnacle get -1 ATK.
"Quit following me, Barn."

name: Battleworld
effect:
Terraform

Characters you control gain the Heroes of Earth affiliation. Characters your opponents control gain the Villains of Earth affiliation.

Activate >>> Target attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK this attack.

name: Black Bolt, Devastating Decree
effect: Cosmic: Whenever Black Bolt stuns a character, you may KO all characters with cost less than the number of face-up resources you control.
"Who could withstand a voice that can sunder mountains?"

name: Black Bolt, Illuminati
effect: Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)When Black Bolt comes into play, look at the top card of your deck. You may replace a resource you control.
Black Bolt’s majesty bolsters his people. No words are needed.

name: Black Bolt, King of the Inhumans
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Leader: Characters adjacent to Black Bolt get +2 DEF.
Some dispute his decisions, but none dispute that he is King.

name: Blue Area of the Moon
effect:
Terraform

Activate >>> Target Inhumans attacker you control gets +1 DEF this attack for each face-up resource you control.
"Here, the deadly pollution of Earth could never threaten us."

name: Bron Char, Lunatic Legion
effect:
Reservist, Press

Discard a Kree character card >>> The controller of target character with cost 2 or less KO's a resource he controls. If he does, he puts that character face down into his resource row. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Cannibal Tech
effect:
As an additional cost to play Cannibal Tech, discard a card.

Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Captain America, Skrull Impostor
effect: Cosmic: Attackers you control with three or more team affiliations cannot be stunned.
"By the time these humans figure it out, I'll be in every home in America."

name: Captain Att-Lass, Starforce
effect: Press (When you recruit this card, your next character costs 1 less to recruit this turn for each press card you recruited this turn, but no less than 1.)
"Wonder Man? What a ridiculous name."

name: Carnage, Symbiote Surfer
effect: Cosmic: Each of your opponents who does not have the initiative cannot gain the initiative.
"Violence. Madness. Anarchy. These are my gifts to the universe."

name: Clumsy Foulup, Puppet Dictator
effect:
Press

Whenever you recruit a character, Clumsy Foulup gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this turn.

Whenever Clumsy Foulup's ATK becomes 5 or greater, return him to his owner's hand.
"See? I not as stupid as I look."

name: Colonel Yon-Rogg, Commander of the Helion
effect:
Press

Exhaust three front row Kree characters you control >>> Stun target character. Use this power only once per turn and only during your attack step.
"Helmsman! Set course for Earth. The hour of reckoning is at hand."

name: Commander Dylon Cir, Lunatic Legion
effect:
Reservist, Press (When you recruit this card, your next character costs 1 less to recruit this turn for each press card you recruited this turn, but no less than 1.)

Whenever Commander Dylon Cir attacks, the defending player replaces a face-up non–Team-Up resource he controls.

name: Conquered Planet
effect: Target Kree attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each face-down resource target opponent controls.
"Your planet is in good hands now, Skrull."

name: Cosmic Necessity
effect:
As an additional cost to play Cosmic Necessity, exhaust a Heralds of Galactus character you control.

Target opponent chooses whether you draw two cards or you gain 5 endurance.
"Cease your assault. Galactus must be saved!"

name: Cosmic Order
effect:
Play Cosmic Order only during the recovery phase.

You may KO a stunned character you control. If you do, each other player KO's a stunned character he controls.
"Final judgment is upon thee."

name: Creation of a Herald
effect:
As an additional cost to play Creation of a Herald, discard a Heralds of Galactus card.

If you discarded a card named Galactus, search your deck for any card. Otherwise, search your card for a character card with cost less than the cost of the card you discarded. Reveal that card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Crystal, Elementelle
effect:
Concealed—Optional

When Crystal comes into play, you may KO a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for a Team-Up card, reveal it, put it face down into your resource row, and shuffle your deck.
The elements are not her only allies.

name: Destroyer, Harbinger of Devastation
effect:
At the start of the build phase, you may reveal a card named Galactus from your hand. If you do, put a cosmic counter on Destroyer.

Cosmic—Surge: Destroyer gets +3 ATK / +3 DEF. (This character does not come into play with a cosmic counter. At the start of the recovery phase each turn, put a cosmic counter on this character.)

name: Destroyer, Soulless Juggernaut
effect: Cosmic: Destroyer gets +3 ATK / +3 DEF.
"A gift, from one divinity to another."

name: Dewoz, Dark Reflection
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Pay 2 endurance >>> Move Dewoz and a character in the same column as Dewoz to your hidden or visible area. Use this power only once per turn and only during the combat phase.
Maximus used him, but did not use him up.

name: Dinu, Face of Terror
effect: When Dinu comes into play, the controller of target unequipped character moves it to his hidden area.
Hiding is the best counter to Dinu’s countenance.

name: Divinity, Vampiric General
effect:
At the start of the build phase, KO a resource you control or a Doom character you control.

Whenever Divinity stuns a character, KO that character.
"Death is not the end, my friend."

name: Doom Needs Only Doom
effect:
As an additional cost to play Doom Needs Only Doom, KO a Doom character you control.

Target character gets -4 DEF this turn.
"My apologies, Dr. Hauptmann. Your services are no longer required."

name: Doom-Bot as Dr. Doom, Cosmic Thief
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal

At the start of the recovery phase, stun Doom-Bot.

Cosmic: Doom-Bot gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF and has invulnerability.
"I was sent by the master to steal what he was unable to retain."

name: Doom-Bot Corps, Army
effect: Pay 3 endurance >>> If you do not control a character named Dr. Doom, Doom-Bot Corps has the name Dr. Doom and loses all other names this turn. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Doomed Earth
effect:
As an additional cost to play Doomed Earth, KO two characters you control.

Ongoing: Doom characters you control get +2 ATK.
"This planet survives by Doom's will alone."

name: Doomstadt, Castle Doom
effect:
Terraform

You are considered to control Dr. Doom.

Characters you control named Dr. Doom get +3 ATK.
"Built on the bones of our fathers, consecrated with the blood of my enemies."

name: Dorma, Atlantean General
effect: KO a character you control >>> Characters you control get +1 ATK while attacking this turn. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"The wrath of Atlantis is upon you!"

name: Dr. Doom, Latverian Monarch
effect: Cosmic: KO a character you control >>> You get an additional attack step after this one. At the start of your next attack step this turn, ready all characters you control. Use this power only during your attack step and only once per turn.
"Let Doom demonstrate the proper use of the Power Cosmic."

name: Dr. Doom, Richards's Rival
effect:
When Dr. Doom comes into play, you may search your deck for a plot twist card, reveal it, shuffle your deck, and put that card on the top of your deck.

KO a character you control >>> Replace a resource you control. Use this power only once per turn.
"None but Doom are fit to rule Latveria!"

name: Dr. Doom, Sorcerous Savant
effect: KO a character you control >>> Turn target plot twist you control face down. Use this power only once per turn.
"To destroy Richards, no cost is too high!"

name: Dr. Minerva, Starforce
effect:
Reservist, Press

When Dr. Minerva comes into play, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed Kree character card into your hand and the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.
"I won't lie . . . this will hurt quite a bit."

name: Dr. Strange, Illuminati
effect:
Concealed

Cosmic: Pay X endurance >>> Look at the top X cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Drax the Destroyer, Protector of the Power Gem
effect: Whenever an opponent plays a plot twist, Drax the Destroyer gets -1 ATK / -1 DEF this turn.
"What he lacks in mental acuity he more than makes up for in enthusiasm."

name: Ego the Living Planet
effect:
You may choose not to ready Ego the Living Planet during the recovery phase.

Activate >>> Exhaust target location. While Ego the Living Planet remains exhausted, that location cannot ready.
"The planets in this sector are dull. There's never any interesting conversation."

name: Elemental Battle
effect: Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack. If that character has the Heralds of Galactus affiliation, gain 3 endurance.
"A woman? Is this your planet's greatest warrior?"

name: Elemental Converters
effect:
Terraform

As an additional cost to flip Elemental Converters, discard any number of Heralds of Galactus cards with a combined cost 4 or greater.

Activate >>> Draw a card.

name: Elite Doom Guards, Army
effect: Reveal Elite Doom Guards, exhaust a defender you control named Dr. Doom >>> Put Elite Doom Guards into your support row. Use this power only if Elite Doom Guards is in your hand.
"We live - and die - for the Baron."

name: Enemy of the Empire
effect:
Play Enemy of the Empire only if you control a Kree character and only during the recovery phase.

If you control fewer stunned characters than target opponent, he loses 1 endurance for each card in your hand.
"Why do you struggle for this pitiful mudball?"

name: Ethan Edwards, Visitor from Another World
effect: Cosmic: Ethan Edwards gets +1 ATK for each team affiliation he has.
"How's that, Spidey? Did I do well?"

name: Expendable Ally
effect: Negate target plot twist or payment effect an opponent controls targeting a character you control named Dr. Doom. That character gets +5 ATK this turn.
"Your sacrifice for the glory of Doom is duly noted."

name: Exploiting the Flaw
effect:
Play Exploiting the Flaw only if you control an Inhumans attacker.

Target exhausted, non-attacking Inhumans character you control becomes an attacker and cannot cause breakthrough this attack. Remove all other attackers from this attack.
“In everything there hides a weakness.”

name: Extended Family, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Extended Family, choose two different affiliations among characters you control.

You may discard a card, if you do, put a cosmic counter on a cosmic Inhumans character you control.

Ongoing: Crossover the chosen affiliations.

name: Final Decree
effect:
Play Final Decree only if you control an Inhumans character and only during the build phase.

If you have played no other plot twists this turn, replace any number of resources you control. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, lose 2 endurance for each face-down resource you control.

name: Firelord, Harbinger of Havoc
effect: Cosmic: Discard a character card >>> Firelord gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the cost of the card you discarded. Use this power only once per turn.
"I love it when they try to fight back."

name: Firelord, Pyreus Kril
effect: Discard a card with cost 4 or greater >>> Firelord gets +4 ATK this attack. Use this power only once per turn.
"Eager and attentive. Almost without fault."

name: For the Glory of Doom!, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play For the Glory of Doom!, choose two different team affiliations among characters you control.

Ongoing: Crossover the chosen affiliations.

KO a Doom character you control >>> Target player loses 2 endurance. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Frankie Raye as Nova, Harbinger of Death
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal

Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, if you have three or fewer cards in hand, draw cards until you have four cards in hand.
"Please don't make this worse than it has to be."

name: Frankie Raye as Nova, Optimistic Youth
effect:
You may discard a card rather than pay Frankie Raye's recruit cost.

When Frankie Raye comes into play, you may discard a card with cost 4 or greater. If you do, draw two cards.
"Enjoy your freedom, Frankie Raye. Soon I will hunger anew."

name: Frankie Raye as Nova, Soul Searcher
effect: Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, draw a card.
A crisis of conscience would eventually lead to her death.

name: Franklin Richards, Creator of Counter-Earth
effect:
Mutant — Energy

Concealed

Cosmic—Surge: Remove a cosmic counter from Franklin Richards >>> Move target cosmic character you control to your hidden or visible area. (This character does not come into play with a cosmic counter. At the start of the recovery phase each turn, put a cosmic counter on this character.)

name: Galactus, Devourer of Worlds (Extended Art)
effect: When Galactus comes into play, you may gain endurance equal to target opponent's endurance total. If you do, that player's endurance total becomes 0.

name: Galactus, The Maker
effect: Cosmic: Activate >>> Galactus has invulnerability this turn. Target opponent loses half his endurance, rounded up. Use this power only during your attack step.
"Herald . . . I hunger."

name: Galan, Famished
effect: Activate >>> Gain 2 endurance.
"More, please."

name: Gamora, Protector of the Time Gem
effect: Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, you may have Gamora get +2 ATK / +2 DEF this turn. If you do, you cannot play plot twists this turn.
"She's the deadliest woman in the galaxy."

name: Gathering the Watch
effect:
As an additional cost to play Gathering the Watch, reveal an Infinity Gem card from your hand.

Search your deck for an Infinity Watch character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"You will shoulder a responsibility that no single being could handle."

name: Genetic Destiny
effect:
Play Genetic Destiny only if you control more characters than an opponent.

Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed Kree character card into your hand and the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.
"The plan is set. Our future unfolds."

name: Gorgon, Thundering Hooves
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Cosmic: While Gorgon is visible, characters cannot ready.
His very presence is enough to make opponents reconsider.

name: Hala
effect:
Terraform

Activate >>> Target Kree attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each character you recruited this turn.

Take heed, enemies of my Fatherland,
Think not you can stay our hand.
Unyielding will, we are Kree.

name: Haywire, Suicidal Lover
effect:
Reservist

While Haywire is equipped, he gets +1 ATK.

While you have no cards in hand, Haywire gets +1 ATK.
"No even Death herself can stop me!"

name: Himalayan Enclave
effect:
Terraform

Activate >>> Move target Inhumans character with concealed you control to your hidden or visible area.

Hidden characters you control get +1 DEF.

name: Human Torch, Sparky
effect: Activate >>> Target player loses 1 endurance for each face-up resource you control.
Even Reed doesn't know the upper limit of Johnny's nova flame.

name: Human Torch, The Invisible Man
effect:
Heralds of Galactus defenders you control have reinforcement.

Cosmic: If a character you control would cause breakthrough, instead, you gain that much endurance.
"I don't fight like a girl . . . I fight like my sister."
attributes: • Team Affiliation: Heralds of Galactus / Fantastic Four

name: I Hunger
effect:
Play I Hunger only if you control a Heralds of Galactus character.

If an opponent would take stun endurance loss this turn, instead you gain that much endurance.
"This world leaves me unsatisfied—Galactus still hungers."

name: I Must Obey
effect:
As an additional cost to play I Must Obey, reveal a character card named Galactus from your hand.

If you have played no other plot twists this turn, each player exhausts a ready character he controls.
"Only I may decide who is worthy of my attentions."

name: Improper Burial
effect:
As an additional cost to play Improper Burial, exhaust a Kree character you control.

The controller of target stunned character KO's a resource he controls. If he does, he puts that character face down into his resource row.
"No time for formalities—just die!"

name: Inspiring Demise
effect:
Play Inspiring Demise only from your resource row.

Target Heralds of Galactus attacker you control gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF this attack. The defending player gains 4 endurance.
"Let her death be a lesson to the rest of you: I will not be trifled with."

name: Intergalactic Summit
effect:
As an additional cost to play Intergalactic Summit, choose two different team affiliations among characters you control.

Crossover the chosen affiliations this turn. If Intergalactic Summit is in your resource row, draw a card.
"You all know the threat that faces us—and you know its name."

name: Interstellar Offensive
effect: Target attacker gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +3 ATK this attack if it has the Skrull affiliation and more team affiliations than a defending character.
"Let us show them the price of their arrogance!"

name: Invisible Woman, Baroness Von Doom
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Defenders you control with cost 3 or less in the same area as Invisible Woman have reinforcement.
"My family is falling apart, and all I can do is watch."

name: Invisible Woman, Flame On!
effect: Cosmic: Whenever Invisible Woman attacks or defends, target player loses 1 endurance for each face-up resource you control.
"I had no idead it felt this good to just cut loose!"

name: Iron Man, Illuminati
effect: Free >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed a plot twist card, Iron Man gets +3 ATK this turn. Use this power only once per turn.
"Our only hope is to work together, Doom."

name: It's Slobberin' Time!
effect: Target attacker you control gets +3 DEF this attack and an additional +3 ATK this attack if it has the Inhumans affiliation and you control no face-down resources.
"I finally say somethin' funny—and the only one who hears can't tell nobody!"

name: Jolen, The Treacherous One
effect:
Concealed—Optional

Cosmic—Surge: Whenever Jolen defends against or attacks a character, exhaust that character and it cannot be ready this turn. (This character does not come into play with a cosmic counter. At the start of the recovery phase each turn, put a cosmic counter on this character.)

name: Kang, Destiny Warrior
effect:
Kang is not unique.

Whenever Kang stuns a character, you may exhaust target front row character an opponent controls.
"It will be different this time, Doom. This time, Kang wins."

name: Kang, One of Many
effect:
Kang is not unique.

Activate, reveal a card from your hand named Dr. Doom or named Kang >>> Exhaust target character with cost 2 or less.
In the pursuit of ever-greater power, no alliance is unthinkable.

name: Karnak, The Shatterer
effect:
Loyalty—Reveal, Concealed—Optional

Cosmic-Surge: Remove a cosmic counter from Karnak >>> Target character gets -X DEF while defending this turn, where X is its printed DEF. Use this power only once per turn.
He fights with precision, not strength.

name: Katrina Luisa Van Horne as Amazon, Unrepentant Hero
effect:
Reservist

At the start of the combat phase, each player puts the top card of his deck face down into his resource row. If he does, that player KO's a resource he controls at the start of the recovery phase this turn.
"Next time, bring the key."

name: Kindred Spirits
effect: Search your deck for up to two Heralds of Galactus character cards, reveal them, shuffle your deck, and put those cards on the top of your deck.
"Nova, your appetite for life has illuminated my darkened soul."

name: Klaw, Sonic Construct
effect:
Klaw cannot ready during the recovery phase.

KO a character you control >>> Ready Klaw, and he cannot attack this phase. Use this power only once per turn.
“Doom-de-doom-doom . . . ”

name: Korath the Pursuer, Starforce
effect:
Press (When you recruit this card, your next character costs 1 less to recruit this turn for each press card you recruited this turn, but no less than 1.)

Pay 2 endurance >>> Target Kree character you control can attack hidden characters this turn.

name: Kree Commandos, Army
effect:
Reservist

When Kree Commandos comes into play, target character you control gets +2 ATK this turn.

Whenever Kree Commandos becomes stunned, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Kree Public Accusers, Army
effect:
Reservist

Kree Public Accusers comes into play, name a non-ongoing plot twist card. Your opponents cannot play cards with that name this turn.

Our future, universes to possess.
Our fate, dimensions to oppress.
Race supreme, we are Kree.

name: Kree Soldiers, Army
effect:
Reservist

When Kree Soldiers comes into play, it gets +1 ATK this turn.

Whenever Kree Soldiers becomes stunned, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Lancer, Samantha Dunbar
effect: Stun Lancer >>> Whenever a character you control named Dr. Doom stuns a character this turn, you may stun a character with cost 3 or less.
"I wouldn't be alive if it weren't for you, Doom. I'll do whatever it takes to repay you."

name: Lieutenant Kona Lor, Lunatic Legion
effect:
Reservist, Press (When you recruit this card, your next character costs 1 less to recruit this turn for each press card you recruited this turn, but no less than 1.)

When Lieutenant Kona Lor comes into play, target opponent replaces a face-up non–Team-Up resource he controls.

name: Litterbug, Killer Cockroach
effect:
Mutant — Physical

Concealed

Characters you control get +3 ATK while attacking a character that has already been attacked this turn.
"KR. KR. KRAAA!"

name: Live Kree … or Die!
effect:
Live Kree … or Die! costs 1 less to play for each Kree character you recruited this turn.

Target character you control gets +5 ATK this attack while in combat with a character with greater cost.
"You're too late, Avengers. The Earth will be enslaved!"

name: Lockjaw, Inhuman's Best Friend
effect:
Concealed—Optional

When Lockjaw comes into play, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for an Inhumans character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"He's so good with kids, isn't he?"

name: Luna Maximoff, Only Human
effect:
Concealed

Activate, return Luna Maximoff to her owner's hand >>> Recover target stunned character you control with cost 3 or less and move it to your hidden area. Use this power only during the combat phase.
Everyone loves this kid.

name: Lunatic Legionnaires, Army
effect:
Reservist

When Lunatic Legionnaires comes into play, it gets +1 ATK this turn for each face-down resource target player controls.

Whenever Lunatic Legionnaires becomes stunned, you may return it to its owner's hand.

name: Lust for Power
effect:
As an additional cost to play Lust for Power, KO a character you control named Dr. Doom.

Ongoing: You cannot draw cards during the draw phase.

At the start of the build phase, reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put all revealed plot twist cards into your hand and the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.

name: Magneto, Acts of Vengeance
effect:
Mutant — Energy

KO a character you control >>> Exhaust target character. Use this power only during your attack step.
"Soon, mankind will be consumed by the fire of its own creation."

name: Mar-Vell as Captain Marvel, Enemy of the Empire
effect:
Reservist

When Mar-Vell comes into play, if you have five or more cards in hand, Mar-Vell gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF this turn.

Discard a Kree character card >>> Whenever Mar-Vell becomes stunned this turn, return him to his owner's hand.

name: Mar-Vell as Captain Marvel, Soldier of the Empire
effect: Press (When you recruit this card, your next character costs 1 less to recruit this turn for each press card you recruited this turn, but no less than 1)
He might have had a bright future in the Kree Militia.

name: Mask of Doom
effect:
As an additional cost to play Mask of Doom, KO a character you control.

Search your deck for a card named Dr. Doom, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Hidden behind that steel veneer is the face of a madman."

name: Master of Puppets
effect:
As an additional cost to play Master of Puppets, exhaust a Doom character you control.

Ongoing: Whenever a character is put into your KO'd pile from play, each opponent loses 1 endurance.
"Obey your master!"

name: Maximus the Mad, Mental Manipulator
effect:
Concealed

At the start of the combat phase, if you control no face-down resources, target opponent moves all characters he controls to his front row.
“A most foul viper at our very bosom . . . ”

name: Medusa, Queen of the Inhumans
effect: Cosmic: Whenever Medusa defends against or attacks a character, exhaust that character. That character cannot ready this turn, and its payment powers cannot be used this turn.
The Inhumans would call her Queen even if her husband were not King.

name: Mephisto, Lord of Hell
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)

Whenever Mephisto attacks, you may return a character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
"Even in the afterlife, there are fates worse than death."

name: Mind Gem, Infinity Gem
effect:
Unique

Whenever equipped character becomes stunned, you may return Mind Gem to it's owner hand.

When Mind Gem comes into play, draw a card and then discard a card.
"No thought shall remain a secret to me."

name: Mole Man, Moloid Master
effect: Pay 1 resource point >>> Replace a plot twist you control. Target player loses X endurance, where X is the cost of the plot twist you replaced. Use this power only once per turn.
"Attack, my minions!"

name: Molecule Man, Owen Reece
effect: Cosmic: Remove a cosmic counter from Molecule Man >>> Copy target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist. You may choose new targets for that copy. Use this power only once per turn.
"I don't know, Doom. Do you really think this will work?"

name: Moloids, Army
effect: Exhaust a character you control named Dr. Doom or named Mole Man >>> Put Moloids from your KO'd pile into your front row. Use this power only during the build phase and only if Moloids is in your KO'd pile.
Under their master's gaze, they felt invincible.

name: Moondragon, Protector of the Mind Gem
effect: Cosmic: If you would draw a card for the first time in a phase, instead, draw two cards.
"Smug and brash, but dependable."

name: Morg, Corrupt Destroyer
effect: Cosmic—Surge: Whenever Morg stuns a character, return that character to its owner hand. (This character does not come into play with a cosmic counter. At the start of the recovery phase each turn, put a cosmic counter on this character.)

name: Morg, Harbinger of Extinction
effect: Cosmic: Whenever a character becomes stunned, you may reveal a Heralds of Galactus character card from your hand. If you do, return that character to its owner's hand unless its controller reveals a card from his hand with cost greater than the cost of the card you revealed.

name: Morg, Slayer
effect: Discard a card >>> Target player returns a character he controls with cost 1 or less to its owner's hand. Use this power only once per turn.
"In this life as in the last, I serve death."

name: Mr. Fantastic, Doom's Adversary
effect:
You are considered to control Dr. Doom.

When Mr. Fantastic comes into play, you may put up to two Army Doom character cards with combined cost 3 or less from your KO'd pile into your front row.
"You should have stayed dead, Victor!"

name: Mr. Fantastic, Illuminati
effect: Cosmic: At the start of the combat phase, look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of face-up resources you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. If you do, discard a card.
"My love for my children trumps my distaste for weapons."

name: Mr. Sinister, Supreme Geneticist
effect:
Concealed

Activate >>> KO target stunned character. Gain endurance equal to that character's cost.
"Your contribution to science is most appreciated."

name: Nahrees, The Negative One
effect:
Concealed

Cosmic—Surge: Pay 2 endurance >>> Target exhausted character cannot ready this turn. Use this power only once per turn and only during the combat phase.

name: Nega-Bands

Unique

name: Nega-Bomb
effect:
Play Nega-Bomb only during the combat phase.

Nega-Bomb costs 1 less to play for each Kree character you recruited this turn.

effect:

name: Nenora, Skrull Usurper

Concealed

Characters you control gain the Kree affiliation.

name: O-Force
effect: Ongoing: While you control an X-Statix character, all characters your opponents control attack each turn if able.
Don't believe everything you see on TV.

name: Pacification
effect: Ongoing: At the start of the combat phase, if you have more cards in hand than an opponent, you may put a cosmic counter on a cosmic Heralds of Galactus character you control.

name: Paibok, The Power Skrull
effect:
At the start of the combat phase, if Paibok has three or more team affiliations, put a cosmic counter on him.

Cosmic: Skrull characters you control get +2 ATK while in combat with a character with fewer team affiliations.

name: Penal Colony
effect:
Terraform

As an additional cost to flip Penal Colony, discard a Kree character card.

Hard labor. Experimentation. Death. Not necessarily in that order.

name: Pip the Troll, Protector of the Space Gem
effect: When Pip the Troll comes into play, you may search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, shuffle your deck, and put that card on the top of your deck.

name: Planet Weapon
effect:
Terraform

At the start of the combat phase, each opponent replaces a face-up non–Team-Up resource he controls and loses endurance equal to that resource's cost.

name: Plasma, Replacement Herald
effect:
Remove a cosmic counter from a character you control >>> Gain 2 endurance.

name: Power Gem, Infinity Gem
effect:
Unique

Whenever equipped character becomes stunned, you may return Power Gem to its owner's hand.

name: Power Struggle
effect:
Play Power Struggle only from your resource row.

Target Inhumans attacker or defender you control gets -3 ATK / +3 DEF this attack.

effect:
As an additional cost to play Pressed into Service, choose two different team affiliations among characters you control.

name: Purple Man, Subtle Manipulator
effect: Whenever an opponent uses a character's payment power, exhaust that character.

effect:
Mutant — Physical

Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.)

effect: Cosmic: Your opponents cannot flip locations or play plot twists from their resource rows.

Reservist

Unique

Unique

effect: Activate, discard a card >>> Return a character you control with cost 2 or greater to its owner's hand. If you do, search your deck for a Kree character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only during your recruit

Concealed

name: Taskmaster, Mnemonic Assassin

name: Technarx, Cyborg General

name: Terragenesis

name: Terrax, Harbinger of Ruin

name: Terrax, The Tamer
effect: Cosmic: Activate, replace a location you control >>> Target opponent stuns a non-stunned character he controls with cost 3 or less.

name: Thanos, Protector of the Reality Gem
effect: Cosmic: Free >>> Characters your opponents control attack this turn if able. Use this power only once per turn.

name: The Devil We Know
effect: Target defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that character has the Doom affiliation, whenever an attacker or defender becomes stunned this attack, KO that attacker or defender.

name: The Enemy Within
effect: Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, if three or more Doom characters were put into your KO'd pile from play this turn, you may put one of those cards from your KO'd pile into your front row exhausted. If you do, remove from the game all other character cards in your KO'd pile that were put there from play this turn.

name: The Fallen One, The Forgotten
effect:
Discard a card with cost 4 or greater >>> Put a cosmic counter on target cosmic character you control. Use this power only once per turn.

Cosmic: Whenever The Fallen One stuns a defender, if you have more cards in hand than that character's controller, you may return that character to its owner's hand.

name: The Great Refuge
effect:
Terraform

Unique
